item.title: Latvia Rebuild v1.28 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 3, 2025

Latvia Rebuild v1.28 1.55 ETS2

Features of this mod:

Cities:
Talsi – Latvia
Jūrmala – Latvia

Roads:
P131 – Latvia
P128 – Latvia
P98 – Latvia
P133 – Latvia
A5 – Latvia
A8 – Latvia
A10 – Latvia

Compatibility update for ETS2 1.55 / ProMods 2.75

Credits: hi sora

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VolksWagen Constellation BOB v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

VolksWagen Constellation BOB v1.0 ETS2

Here is a detailed description of the “Volkswagen Constellation Bob” mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2, based on the information found:

The “Volkswagen Constellation Bob” mod, also known as “SpongeBob,” is a detailed and lightweight truck for Euro Truck Simulator 2, ideal for those looking for a unique transport experience, with a lowered style optimized for the game.

Key Features:
Design and Modeling: The truck was carefully modeled by Sandro Mac, with a realistic interior and several customization options.
Chassis: Includes several chassis configurations, such as 6×2, 6×4, and off-road versions, all with normal and lowered (“arched”) suspension options.
Optimization: Despite having many options, the mod is considered lightweight and optimized so as not to slow down the game.
Sounds: It is compatible with Rafa Sound sounds, and the modder’s website provides a video on how to properly install the files for the sound to work.
Skins: The mod comes with 56 different skins, in addition to the custom paint option, offering a wide range of options for visual customization.
Price and Distribution: The mod is paid, priced at R$ 28.00, and is distributed through the “Mods Fernando Gamer” store.

The mod is frequently updated to ensure compatibility with the latest versions of ETS2 (such as 1.54 and 1.55) and to include improvements and new features.

Credits: FERNANDO GAME FG

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MERCEDINHO v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

MERCEDINHO v1.0 ETS2

In the Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) community, “Mercedinho” is a popular and affectionate term used by Brazilian players to refer to certain mods of older, smaller Mercedes-Benz trucks. The name is a diminutive of “Mercedes” in Portuguese, and it’s used to describe models like the Mercedes-Benz 1113, 1518, or other classic “bicudo” (long-nosed) trucks that were very common in Brazil.
These mods are a huge part of the “Brazilian-style” ETS2 experience, which often involves a focus on:

Classic “BR-style” trucks: The mods often come with a variety of accessories and configurations specific to the Brazilian trucking scene, such as custom exhaust stacks, special wheel sets, and various light options.
Detailed Customization: Mercedinho mods are known for their extensive customization options, including different chassis types, multiple engine and transmission choices, and a huge selection of paint jobs and stickers.
Realistic Sounds and Physics: To capture the feel of driving these classic trucks, the mods typically include custom sound packs that replicate the distinct engine and air brake sounds of older Mercedes-Benz trucks.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: PACK 04 am29 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

PACK 04 am29 v1.0 ETS2

Based on the information available, the “PACK 04 am29” for ETS2 is a mod pack that focuses on short Randon New R trailers, specifically for the transport of grains (“graneleiros”). The “am29” in the name refers to the modder, and the “PACK 04” is a specific release or version within their series of mods.

This mod is well-regarded for its detail and its focus on bringing a more realistic, regional trucking experience to the game, particularly for those who enjoy playing on Brazilian maps.

Key Features of the Mod Pack
Diverse Trailer Types: While it’s primarily a “graneleiro” (grain trailer) pack, it also includes other variations like “carga seca” (dry cargo), “prancha” (flatbed), and even “florestal” (logging) trailers. This gives you a lot of flexibility in the types of cargo you can haul.
Dynamic Loading and Unloading: The mod features dynamic cargo loading, which means the visuals of the cargo (like grains, soybeans, wheat, etc.) will change on the trailer as it’s being loaded.
Multiple Chassis Configurations: The pack supports various chassis configurations, including bitrem (a truck with two trailers) and rodotrem (a truck with a drawbar dolly connecting two trailers).
Customization: It includes a range of customization options, such as different heights for the sides of the trailers, various accessories, and the ability to choose between a standard or a “truck style” (arqueado) version, which is a popular look in Brazil.
Compatibility: The mod is frequently updated by the modder to ensure compatibility with the latest versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2, so you’ll often see updates for versions like 1.54 or 1.55.

Credits: AM20

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
